inclusion.criterion: not been suffering from serious chronic illness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: child stool test must be positive for STH
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: has not been taken any antehelminthic drug in the previous six months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: age of the child less than 2 years old and more than 5 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: stool test negative for any intestinal helminth
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 37-year-old woman who came to the clinic for a routine Pap smear. She has cervical cancer and tested positive for HPV 16.
